method: Spread the party nachos on a large serving platter.
Pour the unicorn salsa over the nachos, ensuring even coverage.
Dice the rainbow celery into small pieces.
Drizzle the galaxy guacamole over the nachos and sprinkle with rainbow sprinkles.
Gently place the rainbow celery pieces on top for added freshness and crunch.
Serve the circular saw fiesta as a crowd-pleasing appetizer.
Enjoy the dairy-free fiesta with friends and family!
